Vučić: Srbija nema nameru da nabavlja S-400, ali će nastaviti da se naoružava

05 Nov 2019, 22:15

Predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić izjavio je večeras u Beogradu da Srbija nema nameru da nabavlja ruski raketni sistem S-400 jer nema novac za to, ali da će nastaviti da se naoružava opremom zbog koje joj ne prete američke sankcije."Imamo avijaciju koja je mnogo jača nego što je bila ranije, pojačavaćemo se i u protivvazdušnoj odbrani, i sa pancirom, i drugim stvarima koje nisu na listi za (američke) sankcije. Ja sam odgovoran čovek, pregledam 100 puta te papire, pogledam šta je na listi za sankcije, kako da se provučemo kao 'kuče kroz tarabu', vodim računa da Srbija bude sve jača", rekao je Vučić na RTS u emisiji Upitnik.On je kazao da Srbija nije glupa, da nikog neće da napada, ali da neće dozvoliti "da bude bambi za klanje"."Nabavljamo samo defanzivno oružje, zaboravite na to da budemo kao moj deda i svi drugi kad ih ustaše samo povedu iz kuće pa ih ubiju jednim metkom ili maljem u glavu", naveo je Vučić.On je rekao da je Srbija mala zemlja okružena članicama NATO, da se naoružava "zato što je slobodna i hoće da ostane slobodna", i da joj ne pada na pamet da nekog napada."Mi svoje nebo i svoju zemlju nikom nećemo da damo. Mi ćemo da gradimo prijateljstva i dobre odnose, ali nećemo da budemo bambi da nas svi progutaju kad im padne na pamet. Neću da dozvolim sebi onu vrstu neodgovornosti koju smo sebi dozvolili devedesetih, da budemo toliko slabi da ne možemo ni da pokušamo da se branimo", kazao je predsednik Srbije.Upitan zašto je juče na konferenciji za novinare sa specijalnim izaslanikom američkog državnog sekretara za Zapadni Balkan Metjuom Palmerom prećutao njegovu nedavnu poruku da Srbija neće ući u EU dok ne prizna nezavisnost Kosova, Vučić je rekao da nije govorio o tome zato što je "hiljadu puta ranije" to rekao, ali je dodao da je pred Palmerom kazao da su "i Amerikanci, i Nemci i Englezi pogazili sve principe vladavine prava formiranjem vojske Kosova"."Amerikanci nisu nikad menjali poziciju i politiku, uvek su tražili od Srbije da prizna Kosovo, odnosno oni traže obostrano priznanje, ali to je eufemizam za srpsko priznanje Kosova", kazao je Vučić.On je rekao da "ne bi odbacio mogućnost" da će SAD uticati na EU da pojača pritisak na Srbiju i da je moguće da će EU zauzeti stav da je priznanje Kosova uslov za evropske integracije Srbije.Kazao je i da sa Amerikancima može otvoreno da se razgovara, da Srbija sa SAD zna na čemu je pa može da kaže šta neće, a da on "više ne zna šta je čija politika u Evropi".Vučić je za Palmera rekao da je "inteligentan čovek, profesionalac koji dobro radi svoj posao", dok je za specijalnog izaslanika američkog predsednika za dijalog Beograda i Prištine Ričarda Grenela kazao da ima "čudesnu energiju" i "ideje za podizanje ekonomije celog Balkana".Predsednik Srbije je ponovio da je za nastavak dijalog Beograda i Prištine uslov da Kosovo ukine takse na uvoz robe iz Srbije i dodao da je prekid kampanje Beograda za povlačenje priznanja nezavisnosti Kosova moguć jedino ako Priština obustavi kampanju za dobijanje novih priznanja.

Vucic: Serbia does not intend to acquire the S-400, but will continue to arm itself

05 Nov 2019, 21:15

Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic said in Belgrade tonight that Serbia does not intend to acquire the Russian S-400 missile system because it has no money for it, but that it will continue to equip itself with equipment that does not threaten US sanctions. "We have a much stronger aircraft. than before, we will be stepping up in air defense, armor, and other things not on the (US) sanctions list. I'm a responsible man, I look through those papers 100 times, see what's on the sanctions list, how to we are pushing ourselves as 'houses through tarab', I am making sure that Serbia is getting stronger, "Vucic said on RTS on Questionnaire. He said that Serbia is not stupid, that it will not attack anyone, but that it will not allow" to be a bombshell for "We only get defensive weapons, forget about being like my grandfather and everyone else when the Ustashas just take them out of the house and kill them with one bullet or a small head," Vucic said. He said that Serbia is a small country surrounded by the forehead NATO, to arm itself "because it is free and wants to remain free," and it does not occur to it to attack anyone. "We will not give our sky and our country to anyone. We are going to build friendships and good relationships, but we are not going to be the bombshell that everyone swallows us when it comes to them. I will not allow myself the kind of irresponsibility we allowed ourselves in the 1990s to be so weak that we cannot even try to defend ourselves, "said the President of Serbia. Asked why he had a press conference yesterday with the US Secretary of State's Special Envoy for the Western Balkans Matthew Palmer was silent on his recent message that Serbia would not enter the EU until it recognizes Kosovo's independence, Vucic said he had not spoken about it because he had said it "a thousand times before," but added that he had said before Palmer that "Americans , both the Germans and the English violated all the principles of the rule of law by forming the Kosovo Army. "" The Americans have never changed their position and politics, they have always asked Serbia to recognize Kosovo, that is, they seek mutual recognition, but this is a euphemism for Serbian recognition of Kosovo, " He said he "would not reject the possibility" that the US would influence the EU to increase pressure on Serbia and that it is possible that the EU would take the position that recognition Kosovo is a condition for Serbia's European integration. He also said that he can talk openly with the Americans, that Serbia with the US knows what it is, so it can say what it will not do, and that it "no longer knows what its politics are in Europe." said Palmer was "an intelligent man, a professional who does his job well," and said of Richard Grenell, US special envoy for Belgrade-Pristina dialogue, that he had "marvelous energy" and "ideas for boosting the economy of the entire Balkans." He reiterated that the continuation of the Belgrade-Pristina dialogue is a condition for Kosovo to abolish taxes on the import of goods from Serbia, adding that the termination of Belgrade's campaign to withdraw recognition of Kosovo's independence is only possible if Pristina suspends the campaign for new recognitions.
